subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Under Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. — an organization with a history of bureaucratic delay — wasted no time in deciding how it would sanction Penn State.
snippet: Under Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. — an organization with a history of bureaucratic delay — wasted no time in deciding how it would sanction Penn State.
